titleNullable: Anime Production, Genre, Score and Release Date
subtitleNullable: Exploring and Uncovering Trends and Patterns in Anime Series and Movies
descriptionNullable:
_____
# Anime Production, Genre, Score and Release Date Analysis
### Exploring and Uncovering Trends and Patterns in Anime Series and Movies
By  [[source]](https://zenodo.org/record/3715330#.Y8OtFdJBwUE)
_____

### About this dataset
> This dataset includes a collection of anime movies and series, providing key insight into stories, genres, production companies, release dates and scores. Through exploring this data we can learn to understand the trends and patterns driving the creation and consumption of anime worldwide. The various columns provide us with valuable information such as names of titles, URLs for each show or movie, type of show (TV shows or Movies), total number of episodes (if TV show), status (Finished Airing/ Currently Airing/ Not yet aired), release date when it first aired, production company responsible for creating the show/Movie, score out of 10 based on user reviews from riie.net., 4 different categories for each anime's genre that helps us classify them better such as shoujo-ai (Girls Love stories) , Yaoi (Boy Love stories) etc. Additionally  Durations of each title is also available if provided by riie.net in respective fields which further enhances insights into what people consume most used here in this dataset e.g Shorts or Feature length movies etc . These variables are instrumental in order to identify seasonal popularities between Anime genres using visualizations such as histograms , scatter plots etc . With dramatic expansion around the world in terms Anime jobs with Emergence & Development Of Cartoon Network dedicated solely to Anime series & Movies audiences worldwide have broadened their interests in not just Japanimation but a plethora other titans generating insightful datasets like these giving valuable insights into what works best TODAY!

### More Datasets
> For more datasets, click [here](https://www.kaggle.com/thedevastator/datasets).

### Featured Notebooks
> - 🚨 **Your notebook can be here!** 🚨! 

### How to use the dataset
> This dataset provides detailed information about 199 different anime series and movies, including the name of the anime, a URL for more information about it, its type (TV show or movie), total number of episodes, release date and date added to riie.net, production company, overall rating score on webpages on RiiE.net, genre labels (4 genres can be specified for each anime), as well as showing which episodes have already been subbed/dubbed by RiiE.net users. 
> 

### Research Ideas
> - Create a visualization of anime genre trends over time. This could be used to discover how different genres have evolved over the years and which ones have been the most popular during certain time periods. 
> - Analyze patterns in anime ratings across different production companies and determine which companies typically produce the highest quality shows. 
> - Compare anime series with films and analyze differences in ratings, genres, release dates, etc., to determine any notable differences between these two mediums of storytelling

### Acknowledgements
> If you use this dataset in your research, please credit the original authors.
> [Data Source](https://zenodo.org/record/3715330#.Y8OtFdJBwUE)
> 
>


### License
> 
> 
> **License: [CC0 1.0 Universal (CC0 1.0) - Public Domain Dedication](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/)**
> No Copyright - You can copy, modify, distribute and perform the work, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission. [See Other Information](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/).

### Columns

**File: ListAnime.csv**
| Column name             | Description                                                                             |
|:------------------------|:----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| **anime_nama**          | Name of the anime series or movie. (String)                                             |
| **anime_url**           | URL of the anime series or movie. (String)                                              |
| **anime_tipe**          | Type of anime series or movie (TV, Movie, OVA, etc). (String)                           |
| **anime_total_episode** | Total number of episodes in the anime series. (Integer)                                 |
| **anime_status**        | Status of the anime series (Finished Airing, Currently Airing, Not yet aired). (String) |
| **anime_tgl_rilis**     | Release date of the anime series or movie. (Date)                                       |
| **anime_produser**      | Production company of the anime series or movie. (String)                               |
| **anime_skor**          | Score of the anime series or movie out of 10. (Float)                                   |
| **anime_genre1**        | Primary genre of the anime series or movie. (String)                                    |
| **anime_genre2**        | Secondary genre of the anime series or movie. (String)                                  |
| **anime_genre3**        | Tertiary genre of the anime series or movie. (String)                                   |
| **anime_genre4**        | Quaternary genre of the anime series or movie. (String)                                 |
| **anime_durasi**        | Duration of the anime series or movie. (String)                                         |

### Acknowledgements
> If you use this dataset in your research, please credit the original authors.
> If you use this dataset in your research, please credit [](https://zenodo.org/record/3715330#.Y8OtFdJBwUE).
